Author: LuisCar
Title: [Pre-ANN] Ethic Hub Helping finally becomes profitable!
Body: WEB | WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM || FACEBOOK | TWITTER | YOUTUBE   Helping finally becomes profitable!  Ethic Hub is a global decentralized P2P lending platform that thanks to Blockchain technology directly connects investors, looking for highly profitable and positive impact investments, with unbanked small producers from developing countries.  For unbanked small producers: Ethic Hub allows them access to lower rates loans.  For investors looking for profit on an ethical way: Ethic Hub allows them to connect with unbanked small producers.  We aim to reach the vast majority of the 2,455 M unbanked people living in rural areas (mainly agricultural producers).    PRE-SALE IS LIVE NOW! Token: Ethix Price of presale: 1 ETH = 5,000 Ethix Soft cap: 1,000 ETH Hard cap: 2,000 ETH Platform: Ethereum (ERC-20) We accept: ETH Start of the token sale: 8th of February 2018 at 13:00 UTC End of the token sale: 9th of March 2018 at 13:00 UTC Tokens for sale: 52.000.000 Ethix    If you have any questions, feel free to join our Telegram group and ask the team directly. We will kindly answer any of your questions:      ESP - https://t.me/ethichub (spanish speakers).     ENG - https://t.me/ethichubeng (english speakers).

Author: ethic hub
Title: [Pre-ANN] Ethic Hub Helping finally becomes profitable!
Body: We are not even close to Bitconnect vision. In fact I'm sure there are very legitimate projects out there making the whole ecosystem keep growing with good practices. As an ethical project we must behave on an ethical way, for example, we are not agree how the ICO ecosystem is evolving, what I mean by that is: there is no reason for a presale or ICO to ask for tens of millions. What is your motivation of making your project grows and be economically sustainable if you and your team are already millionaires  by just making an ICO? We want to cut off this human behaviour by doing a very small capped Presale, enough to develop the MVP with the funds and present a working product for the ICO months later.    Thank you for your support.

Author: dharmapolice
Title: [Pre-ANN] Ethic Hub Helping finally becomes profitable!
Body: What makes EHH different between other similar projects?

Author: Rutg3rrr1998
Title: [Pre-ANN] Ethic Hub Helping finally becomes profitable!
Body: This was answered earlier by us. We are not even close to Bitconnect vision. In fact I'm sure there are very legitimate projects out there making the whole ecosystem keep growing with good practices. As an ethical project we must behave on an ethical way, for example, we are not agree how the ICO ecosystem is evolving, what I mean by that is: there is no reason for a presale or ICO to ask for tens of millions. What is your motivation of making your project grows and be economically sustainable if you and your team are already millionaires  by just making an ICO? We want to cut off this human behaviour by doing a very small capped Presale, enough to develop the MVP with the funds and present a working product for the ICO months later.   Besides that, bitconnect was not a lending platform like we are. On bitconnect you lended your money for no reason. You lended it for gains, while no one knowed how they made the gains. This was not clear. By EthicHub this is completely clear, since the lenders earn interest from the users who want a lending. By bitconnect you lended the money to the platform and not to other people.
